document.full_text: the vancouver canucks pushed defending stanley cup champions chicago to the brink of elimination from the nhl playoffs on sunday with a 3-2 victory in game three of their first-round series.
document.title: canucks push blackhawks to brink of elimination
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks pushed defending stanley cup champions chicago to the brink of elimination from the nhl playoffs on sunday with a 3-2 victory in game three of their first-round series.
